First generate an API key via `https://aistudio.google.com/api-keys`.

Navigate to `brave://settings/leo-ai/` > `Add new model`. Set the following config:

- **Label:** `Gemini 3 Pro`
- **Model request name:** `gemini-3-pro-preview`
- **Server endpoint:** `https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com/v1beta/openai/chat/completions`
- **Context size:** `100000`
- **API key:** `[your API key]`
- **System Prompt:** (...)
